ros_pub.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
3 
4 import os
5 import pickle
6 import rospy
7 import roslib.packages
8 from moveit_msgs.msg import DisplayTrajectory
9 
10 if __name__ == '__main__':
11 
12  rospy.init_node('chatter', anonymous=True)
13  pub = rospy.Publisher("move_group/display_planned_path", DisplayTrajectory, queue_size=2)
14 
15  packagePath = roslib.packages.get_pkg_dir("python_utils")
16  filePath = os.path.join(packagePath,'src','singer.pickle')
17 
18  if os.path.exists(filePath):
19  with open(filePath, 'rb') as f:
20  data = pickle.load(f)
21 
22 
23  r = rospy.Rate(10) # 10hz
24  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
25  pub.publish(data)
26  r.sleep()
